# contentProposal

**Instance Property**

A prosal of content to play.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var contentProposal: AVContentProposal? { get }
```

## Discussion

The associated player view controller sets this property value.

## Configuring the Proposal

- **AVContentProposal**: An object that describes the content to propose playing after the current item finishes.
- **dateOfAutomaticAcceptance**: The date that the system automatically accepts a proposal if the user doesn’t intervene.
- **playerLayoutGuide**: A layout guide that tracks the size and location of the player view.
- **preferredPlayerViewFrame**: The preferred presentation frame of the player view while the content proposal is active.
